chapter10

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • chapter10.Shape
      • chapter10.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle()
      Triangle initializes the number of sides to 3, width to 0 and height to 0
      Triangle(double width, double height)
      Triangle initializes the number of sides to 3, the width to the width value passed as an argument, and the height to the height value passed as an argument
      Triangle(Triangle triangle)
      Triangle makes a copy of the Triangle object passed as the argument
